text.div:
Relevant Clinicial Information

CodeDescriptionCommentVersion
F Patient was fasting prior to the procedure.added v2.7.1
FNA Fasting not asked of the patient at time of procedure.deprecatedadded v2.7.1, removed after v2.7.1
NF The patient indicated they did not fast prior to the procedure.added v2.7.1
NG Not Given - Patient was not asked at the time of the procedure.added v2.7.1

name: v2.0916
title: v2 Relevant Clincial Information
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0916 ( Relevant Clincial Information)

property.description: A property that indicates the status of the concept. One of active, experimental, deprecated, retired
The date at which a concept was deprecated. Concepts that are deprecated but not inactive can still be used, but their use is discouraged

concept.display: Patient was fasting prior to the procedure.
Fasting not asked of the patient at time of procedure.
The patient indicated they did not fast prior to the procedure.
Not Given - Patient was not asked at the time of the procedure.
